verses.roman:
śuni, sei jāliyā ānandita ha-ila
sabā lañā gela, mahāprabhure dekhāila

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; sei—that; jāliyā—fisherman; ānandita ha-ila—became very happy; sabā lañā—taking everyone; gela—went; mahāprabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhāila—showed.
translation: Hearing this, the fisherman was very happy. He brought all the devotees with him and showed them the body of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
